1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Danny meets Sky, the unrequited love of his life, for a quick drink with the resolve to finally tell her of his love only to have his plans go hopelessly awry.

2.title: Group Assembles
2.plot: The first meeting of the S.G.P.W.D.H.S.G or (the support group for people who don't have a support group) doesn't exactly go as Sky had planned. Unlike Danny hoped people have shown up and they are all just as eccentric as expected, unfortunately that does mean they have their differences and tempers rise.

3.title: The Pep Talk
3.plot: Danny goes into the hall to comfort Sky after the disastrous beginning of Group's first meeting. Sky goes back into the room with a new confidence and regains control.

4.title: Try, Try Again
4.plot: Things are running smoother in the Group room. The 1st meeting is concluded and Danny tries once again to ask out the girl of his dreams.

5.title: The Mission
5.plot: Danny tried and failed to invite Sky out for drinks, and winds up stuck at a bar with half the attendees of the support group. Not-so-secret secrets are revealed. Plans are laid. And a mission is begun.

imdb.plot outline: Group is an ensemble comedy about the struggle to figure out where you belong. It centers around Danny, who is hopelessly in love with his best friend, Sky, a women in her early thirties who just lost her job in psychology and has decided to use her gift of helping people by starting her own support group. Watch as the two of them take the next step to achieving their dreams in this new family friendly comedy from IX Productions.
imdb.title: Group
plot: _Group_ (qv) is an ensemble comedy about the struggle to figure out where you belong. It centers around Danny, who is hopelessly in love with his best friend, Sky, a women in her early thirties who just lost her job in psychology and has decided to use her gift of helping people by starting her own support group. Watch as the two of them take the next step to achieving their dreams in this new family friendly comedy from IX Productions.
